Trade/Device Name(s): Accu-Chek Guide Solo diabetes manager blood glucose monitoring system
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Accu-Chek Guide Solo diabetes manager blood glucose meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Accu-Chek Guide Solo diabetes manager blood glucose monitoring system intended for self-testing of blood glucose in diabetic individuals at home.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitatively measures glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from the fingertip for self-testing by individuals with diabetes at home, includes bolus advisor for insulin dose calculation, not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use, intended for use by a single person.
